TMimePart.Charset
TMimePart     

property Charset: string;

Unit
MIMEpart

Description
String representation of used Mime charset in part. (i.e. 'iso-8859-1') Write to this property automaticly generate value of CharsetCode. This used only for text part.


See also:
ComposeParts, DecodePart, DecodePartHeader, DecomposeParts, DefaultCharset, EncodePart, EncodePartHeader, CharsetCode
